COMMENT_TX: $Managers: Earl Weaver (AL Baltimore), Sparky Anderson (NL Cincinnati); Tied AS Record with six home runs; wind gusted up to 31 mph to RF, especially later in the game; MVP: Frank Robinson (Baltimore)
